PerfectNetExp.abs: 竹影摇情_新浪博客 ... 【SOPRANO】 女高音 【COLORATURA】 花腔 2. 花腔女高音 【FALSETTO】 假声工 2. 假声歌手.
花腔(coloratura，意)歌唱曲调时用(runs)华彩经过句、颤音、华彩段等的装饰唱法。经常有一个较长的音分割成一些较短的音而成。

list.abs: coloratura compositions ; a coloratura performer ., 花腔乐曲 ; 花腔家.
【花腔女高音】西洋歌曲女高音的一种唱法（coloratura soprano的译名）
coloratura compositions ; a coloratura performer ., 花腔乐曲 ; 花腔家.
笔者认为花腔女高音(coloratura)和抒情花腔女高音(lyric coloratura)是有区别的。虽然两者都属于抒情和花腔的交叉声部，但是在作品.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Italian, literally colouring', from Latin colorare 'to colour'

entry.def: Coloratura is very complicated and difficult music for a solo singer, especially in opera.
A coloratura is a singer, usually a woman, who is skilled at singing coloratura.

means.word_mean: 1. a lyric soprano who specializes in coloratura vocal music

auth_sentence.content: The trills, staccatos, scales and arpeggios of the coloratura specialist.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The trills, staccatos, scales and arpeggios of the coloratura specialist.

auth_sentence.content: This is a role that requires a coloratura soprano who can sing in the higher register with great beauty in the voice.
